ygData.subject: groflah quest update
ygData.msgSnippet: ok, groflah does indeed appear in seafarer s wharf. *cringe* he will show up immediately after you get the quest from netuk, but i think you have to do this
ygData.messageBody:
ok, groflah does indeed appear in seafarer's wharf. *cringe* he will
show up immediately after you get the quest from netuk, but i think you
have to do this late at night during the game day.. if you start the
quest at another time, a different npc will appear where groflah would.
(i have seen both talym shoonstar, a lvl 20ish KoS barbarian, and sir
edwin motte, a lvl 30ish KoS paladin. eesh) it is possible to fight
groflah without attracting the attention of bronto the mean ol ogre and
his barbarian friend, just hide around the corner, drop a weak spell on
groflah, and train him upstairs to battle him there. upon returning the
note to netuk, i got an "its about time. innoruuk will be happy", the
usual dismal rage fac hits, and a rusty rapier. whoopee.

considering this quest requires either a lvl 16 necro or a lvl 30 sk to
do it alone (invis is REQUIRED), this quest really isnt rewarding enough
to be worth it. now i suppose we gotta wait until the lady shae quest
gets fixed..

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
